DOC.HEADLINE: COMMUNITY NEWS FOCUS : SAN JUAN CAPISTRANO ; MISSION PLANS NEW MEMBERSHIP PROGRAM
DOC.TEXT: Mission San Juan Capistrano plans to begin a new membership program this month that will offer benefits for South County residents . For a basic fee of $ 35 for one year , members will receive free passes for guests , a quarterly newsletter , discounts at the mission ' s gift_shop , access to special member events and more . Membership proceeds will go toward preservation of the 218-year-old mission . Paving stone tiles engraved with donors ' names are available for $ 100 , $ 200 , $ 300 or $ 1 # 500 . The tiles will be put_on pathways near the entrance of the mission , and money raised benefits the mission ' s preservation . For more information , call ( 714 ) 248-2049 . JEFF BEAN
